attributes.action: Introduce Finnish-Style Baby Boxes for all Expectant or Adoptive Parents
attributes.additional_details:
http://goo.gl/jJLAaS - Baby Box Reduces Infant Mortality and Increases Pre-Natal Care

http://goo.gl/D0Fgsv - BBC Article

https://goo.gl/yHZbja - BBC Interview (video)

http://goo.gl/DN0mMc - Information from the Finnish Government

https://goo.gl/O7ei28 - Wikipedia Article (short)

The buying power of the UK Gov on behalf of the ~680,000 mothers plus adopters would be beneficial for costing.

The UK Gov. could work alongside the Finnish Gov in designing the programme.
attributes.background: We should give all expectant or adoptive parents a Maternity Package - a box containing all the basic items for childcare including: bodysuits, indoor / outdoor clothing, sleeping bag, nappies, cream, towel, care products and a small mattress (allows the box to be used as a crib).
